name: Seneca Foods Corporation
description: Seneca Foods Corporation is one of the leading providers of canned fruits and vegetables in the United States. Founded in 1949, the company is headquartered in Marion, New York. Seneca Foods operates a diverse portfolio of brands, producing a wide range of products including canned corn, peas, green beans, and fruit, among others. With a commitment to quality and sustainability, Seneca emphasizes the use of locally sourced ingredients and environmentally friendly practices in its manufacturing processes. The company operates multiple processing facilities across the country, enabling it to serve both retail and food service customers effectively. Seneca Foods is dedicated to innovation in food technology and product development, continually enhancing its offerings to meet changing consumer preferences. Their mission is to provide high-quality, nutritious food products while maintaining a sustainable approach to agriculture and manufacturing. In addition to traditional canned goods, Seneca Foods is also exploring opportunities in organic and specialty products, aligning with the growing consumer trend towards health-conscious eating. The company prides itself on its long-standing relationships with farmers and suppliers, working collaboratively to ensure the best quality products for consumers. With a focus on operational excellence, Seneca Foods is well-positioned to navigate the evolving landscape of the food industry and meet the demands of its customers.

seo.meta_title: Seneca Foods Corporation | Canned Fruits and Vegetables
seo.meta_description: Explore Seneca Foods Corporation, a leading provider of canned fruits and vegetables in the U.S. Discover our commitment to quality, sustainability, and innovation.

faq.question: What products does Seneca Foods offer?
faq.answer: Seneca Foods offers a wide range of canned vegetables and fruits, including corn, peas, green beans, peaches, and fruit cocktail.

faq.question: Where is Seneca Foods headquartered?
faq.answer: Seneca Foods is headquartered in Marion, New York, USA.

faq.question: What is Seneca Foods' commitment to sustainability?
faq.answer: Seneca Foods emphasizes locally sourced ingredients and environmentally friendly practices in its manufacturing processes.
